page.title: 12Industry
page.content: The Industrial Estate in Penkridge has been there since 1968. It is situated on Wolgarston Way near the junction of the Wolverhampton Road and Lyne Hill Lane.It consists of mostly offices and workshops.There are four factories on the site,these are: Mitchell Cotts :Which produce slurry pumps.British Sugar Corporation :Which store sugar.SPD Warehousing :Who rent out warehouses,and Caven Engineering:Who make jigs and fixtures.There are not now so many factories on the site due to the recession,recently Michelin tyres have closed down.This has happened to many of the factories on the site so the is not as big and prosperous as it used to be.
